ReleaseInfo.Name: HomeGenie
ReleaseInfo.ReleaseNote: - Replaced nmqtt library with M2Mqyy.Net - Fixed Data.Module.NeedsUdpdate serialization bug - Reset oldest 24 hours of data instead of whole DB when statistics DB exceed size limit - Fixed Web Server (MIG) headers bug preventing client from caching files - Added event raising when a module property is changed from the UI; deprecated HG.Automation.Programs.PostBack
